ai-tha-ap504:0.3_0: ° After attaining one bowl of the Elder Nuns
ai-tha-ap504:2.3_0: Having given the bowl to the Fortunate One,
ai-tha-ap504:3.1_0: I am born in a existence,
ai-tha-ap504:5.3_0: have arisen in the right way.
ai-tha-ap504:6.1_0: The fool is fortunate for you,
ai-tha-ap504:6.2_0: In the world with its gods,
ai-tha-ap504:6.3_0: Intending to do the invitation procedure
ai-tha-ap504:6.4_0: the fruit of meat will be made of meat.
ai-tha-ap504:7.2_0: belonging to the Sangha and a group,
ai-tha-ap504:7.4_0: A giver of happiness for all living creatures.
ai-tha-ap504:8.2_0: Homage to you, supreme among men!
ai-tha-ap504:8.3_0: After giving a bowl and robes
ai-tha-ap504:9.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap504:11.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap504:13.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Senior.
ai-tha-ap504:14.1_0: This is the second kind of Elder Nun Pañcakaṅga
